modules.description: Generates spatial transformation functions for user-defined types containing Scad.t and Vec3.t, enabling operations like translation, rotation, and scaling. Works with abstract and record types that include supported geometric data structures. Enables direct manipulation of 3D models by automatically implementing transformation logic for custom type definitions.

Generates transformation functions like translate, scale, rotate, and mirror for user-defined types containing Scad_ml.Scad.t and Scad_ml.Vec3.t values, recursively applying mappings to lists, options, and tuples. Supports custom mapping conventions via attributes to handle types with varying function parameter styles. Enables spatial manipulation of complex data structures by automatically deriving transformation logic based on type definitions.
